reviewText: These are four movies that provide action that are worth your dollars and time. They used to say that "Jaws" had you sitting 4" above your seat. These will grab you and have you sitting on the edge of the couch. Partners that fall out,  Partners lost, betrayed, revenged and new friends found. All to the sound track of weapons, explosions, and screeching tires, even an occasional body falling.  So, get some pillows to fill the space between your back and the back of the couch, and enjoy.
